name: H.Res.553 [117th]
text: - Of inquiry requesting the President and directing the Secretary of Health and Human Services and the Secretary of Homeland Security to transmit, respectively, certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to unaccompanied alien children.

name: H.Res.560 [117th]
text: - Congratulating the Milwaukee Bucks, and the fans of the Milwaukee Bucks around the world, on winning the 2021 National Basketball Association championship.

name: H.Res.552 [117th]
text: - Recognizing the importance of independent living for individuals with disabilities made possible by the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 and calling for further action to strengthen home and community living for individuals with disabilities.

name: H.Res.556 [117th]
text: - Recognizing the importance of access to comprehensive, high-quality, life-affirming medical care for women of all ages.

name: H.Res.557 [117th]
text: - Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives against the malignant and metastasizing ideology of anti-Semitism.

name: H.Res.558 [117th]
text: - Urging the European Union to designate Hizballah in its entirety as a terrorist organization.

name: H.Res.554 [117th]
text: - Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

name: H.Res.555 [117th]
text: - Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4502) making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

name: H.R.4679 [117th]
text: - To designate the Federal building located at 1200 New Jersey Avenue Southeast in Washington, DC, as the Norman Yoshio Mineta Federal Building.

name: H.Res.561 [117th]
text: - Recognizing and celebrating the 200th anniversary of the entry of Missouri, the Show Me State, into the Union as the 24th State.

name: H.Res.562 [117th]
text: - Supporting the designation of August 24, 2021, as Kobe Bryant Day.

name: H.Res.559 [117th]
text: - Expressing the Nation’s sincerest appreciation for the service of the World War II Filipino veterans who fought in the Armed Forces on the 80th anniversary of President Franklin D. Roosevelt’s military order.

name: H.R.4620 [117th]
text: - To amend the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to limit the exemption provided for family offices from the definition of an investment adviser, and for other purposes.

name: H.R.4616 [117th]
text: - Adjustable Interest Rate (LIBOR) Act of 2021

name: H.R.4617 [117th]
text: - To be added Act of 2021

name: H.R.4619 [117th]
text: - To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to prohibit trading ahead by market makers, and for other purposes.

name: H.R.4618 [117th]
text: - Short Sale Transparency and Market Fairness Act

name: H.R.4660 [117th]
text: - To designate the Federal Building and United States Courthouse located at 1125 Chapline Street in Wheeling, West Virginia, as the Frederick P. Stamp, Jr. Federal Building and United States Courthouse.

name: H.R.4590 [117th]
text: - Promoting New and Diverse Depository Institutions Act

text: - Freedom to Fly Act

text: - Supporting Working Mothers Act

text: - Primary Care Enhancement Act of 2021

text: - Supply Chain Vulnerability Assessment Act of 2021

name: H.R.4298 [117th]
text: - Inclusive Elections Act of 2021

name: H.R.4299 [117th]
text: - Foster Care Stabilization Act

text: - NEPA State Assignment Expansion Act

name: H.R.4335 [117th]
text: - NEPA Accountability and Enforcement Act

text: - Crisis Care Enhancement Act

text: - Labor Market Response Act

text: - No Red and Blue Banks Act

text: - Alexander Lofgren Veterans in Parks (VIP) Act

name: H.R.4293 [117th]
text: - Supporting America’s Young Entrepreneurs Act of 2021

name: H.R.2485 [117th]
text: - To require the Director of the Government Publishing Office to establish and maintain a single online portal accessible to the public that allows the public to obtain electronic copies of all congressionally mandated reports, and for other purposes.

name: H.R.2365 [117th]
text: - Gold Star Mothers Family Monument Extension Act

name: H.R.1664 [117th]
text: - To authorize the National Medal of Honor Museum Foundation to establish a commemorative work in the District of Columbia and its environs, and for other purposes.

text: - Great Dismal Swamp National Heritage Area Act

text: - Free Veterans from Fees Act

name: H.R.438 [117th]
text: - To amend the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children Act to extend the deadline for a report by the Alyce Spotted Bear and Walter Soboleff Commission on Native Children, and for other purposes.
